<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VisitNode(DT-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortreebase/#a1dfeebf79b630b7c859bdbfd58a09c03">getRootNode</a>(), 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Visit the dominator subtree rooted at Node in pre-order.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If TLSBaseAddrReg is non-null, then use that to replace any</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TLS&#95;LDCALL instructions. Otherwise, create the register</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// when the first such instruction is seen, and then use it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// as we encounter more instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">                                 </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TLSBaseAddrReg) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Traverse the current block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ab2d91e7bec944efcbc39d8e30644f111">begin</a>(), E = BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acbc921830578e2741be6549db716c0ce">end</a>(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != E; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SystemZ::TLS&#95;LDCALL:</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
